name: SuperLite 3 in 1 Series: Tsuri Syuu
overview: Superlite 3 in 1 - Series Tsuri Shuu is a compilation of 3 fishing games released for the Playstation One console: - Fishing Club - Boat no Tsuriken: (The Boat Fishing) In this game the player go fishing using a boat. - Fishing Club - Bouhatei no Tsuriken: (The Breakwater fishint) In this game the player can go fishing in docks near the sea. - Fishing Club - Hama no Tsuriken: (The beach fishing) In this game the player can go fishing in beachs.
